name: data.loss()
description:
Recover your data in a complex matrix while avoiding malicious viruses and unpredictable corruptions.

Controls:
Click on adjacent nodes to move the character.
Adjust the sound volume using the slider on the top right.

Programming:
Fierclash - William Lau
Fayr - Benjamin Lee

Art:
Fierclash - William Lau

Music/Sounds:
